channel.title: Can someone help?
channel.description:
I've got a donator ticket item on my server, correct? And it has an option 'Promote' while i'm in-game... either it's because im tired or just don't plain know it, but how would I go about writing a piece of code to execute a command (eg. make someone a donator) when they click the 'promote' option in-game?
Thanks in Advance! :D
